author: Hemant Mehta
title: Pat Robertson Compared Climate Scientists to Religious Fundamentalists
text:
February 2, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
You thought climate change was settled science? You were wrong , says Pat Robertson . Sure, he doesn’t understand the topic, but he knows it can’t be true. 
… Robertson blasted climate scientists as a group of closed-minded religious fundamentalists: “This thing has become like a religion, if you don’t believe in climate change, then you have violated the tenets of the religion and you need to be excommunicated , it’s just unbelievable.” 
Robertson called the science “unsettled,” claiming that any number of factors could be causing climate change and wondering if “the earth is actually getting a little cooler now than hotter.” 
Spoiler: It’s not getting cooler . 
Just to state the obvious, science isn’t a religion. It requires evidence. It’s self-correcting. It moves in the direction of greater understanding. It’s not whatever the hell you want it to be. 
No wondering Robertson doesn’t get it.
